EmailTemplate.name: Ford Rotunda Promotional Products/Emergency Kit E-mail
EmailTemplate.subject: Great Tools to help you drive sales
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Ford Rotunda Email
888.263.3423 (888-2-OFFICE)
My Account Technology Furniture Ink & Toner Paper Office Supplies
Promotional items personalized with your brand can steer customers to your dealership! The more people see your dealership’s name helps establish you as a Ford Lincoln destination of choice. Our partnership allows us to provide you with a variety of cost-effective promotional products personalized with your dealership’s logo to help drive more traffic to your showroom and make an impression they’ll remember. • Stainless steel beverage mugs • Key tags • Pens, note pads and desk accessories • Polo shirts and much more • Personalized Emergency Kits • Our vehicle Pack Emergency Kit can be branded with your dealership’s logo. Features an LED flashlight, • glow sticks and many more items your customers may need in an emergency situation when traveling.
Call or click to start promoting your dealership today! Register for your Office Depot® account at odams.officedepot.com/apps/landing/custom/ford or onerotunda.com to see our full assortment of promotional items and the latest pricing.
Click here to start your journey. Lisa Creamer Account Manager | Office Depot, Inc. 855.337.6811 Ext. 12878 Elisabeth.Creamer@officedepot.com
